snippet.title: OUTRUN (C64 - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Out Run (un-emulated) for the C64, a true classic from the golden era of c64 gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1988

Actually this really isn't a bad version compared to the other 8-bits, it's fast, frantic and has good music but after 7 attempts I still can't fucking complete it! Always running out of time right at the end, Grrrrr..., in the end I used an infinite time cheat so I could upload the game in full for your viewing pleasure which includes all 5 courses.
What I don't like about this version is the way you have to load it in, it is split into 5 loads meaning each load is a complete course so you don't have a choice of which direction off the road to take at the end of each stage :-/

Hope all you C64 fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the c64 and it's cool games alive!!!
